00019 bool FREngine::Init() {
00020 
00021         if (FT_Init_FreeType(&Library)) {
00022                 return false;
00023         }
00024 
00025         if (GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog() != 0)
00026                 GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeLine(TAG,
00027                                 "Initialized FreeType font engine\n");
00028 
00029         return true;
00030 }

00032 bool FREngine::Load(File* filenode) {
00033         //Null sent return false
00034         if (filenode == 0)
00035                 return false;
00036 
00037         //Type not a file, return false
00038         if (filenode->getType() != fileId)
00039                 return false;
00040 
00041         //Empty file obviously isn't a font
00042         if (filenode->length() == 0)
00043                 return false;
00044 
00045         DataInputStream* strm = filenode->createInputStream();
00046 
00047         if (strm == 0)
00048                 return false;
00049 
00050         if (strm->open(false) == false) {
00051                 delete strm;
00052                 return false;
00053         }
00054 
00055         unsigned char* data = new unsigned char[filenode->length()];
00056 
00057         if (strm->read(data, filenode->length()) == false) {
00058                 delete[] data;
00059                 delete strm;
00060 
00061                 return false;
00062         }
00063 
00064         delete strm;
00065 
00066         int Return = FT_New_Memory_Face(Library, data, filenode->length(), 0,
00067                         &FontFace);
00068 
00069         //TODO: Work out a way of deleting the data when it's no longer needed
00070         //delete[] data;
00071 
00072         if (Return == FT_Err_Unknown_File_Format) {
00073                 //The file is not in the right file format.
00074                 return false;
00075         } else if (Return) {
00076                 //Unable to load font file.
00077                 return false;
00078         }
00079 
00080         GlyphSlot = FontFace->glyph;
00081 
00082         std::string lString = "Loaded freetype font: ";
00083         lString += filenode->getName();
00084         lString += "\n";
00085 
00086         if (GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog() != 0) {
00087                 GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeLine(TAG,
00088                                 lString.c_str());
00089         }
00090 
00091         return true;
00092 }

00094 void FREngine::LoadFontmap(int PointSize) {
00095         SetFontPointSize(PointSize);
00096 
00097         FontMap newFontMap;
00098 
00099         newFontMap.PointSize = PointSize;
00100 
00101         for (int c = 0; c < 255; c++) {
00102 
00103                 FT_Load_Char(FontFace, (char) c, FT_LOAD_RENDER);
00104 
00105                 newFontMap.CharList[c].CharWidth = GlyphSlot->bitmap.width;
00106                 newFontMap.CharList[c].CharHeight = GlyphSlot->bitmap.rows;
00107 
00108                 newFontMap.CharList[c].Width = NextPowerTwo(GlyphSlot->bitmap.width);
00109                 newFontMap.CharList[c].Height = NextPowerTwo(GlyphSlot->bitmap.rows);
00110                 newFontMap.CharList[c].AdvanceX = GlyphSlot->advance.x >> 6;
00111 
00112                 newFontMap.CharList[c].OffsetX = GlyphSlot->bitmap_left;
00113                 newFontMap.CharList[c].OffsetY = GlyphSlot->bitmap_top;
00114 
00115                 uint8_t* Data = new uint8_t[2 * newFontMap.CharList[c].Width
00116                                 * newFontMap.CharList[c].Height];
00117 
00118                 for (int j = 0; j < newFontMap.CharList[c].Height; j++) {
00119 
00120                         for (int i = 0; i < newFontMap.CharList[c].Width; i++) {
00121 
00122                                 Data[2 * (i + j * newFontMap.CharList[c].Width)] = Data[2 * (i
00123                                                 + j * newFontMap.CharList[c].Width) + 1] = (i
00124                                                 >= GlyphSlot->bitmap.width || j
00125                                                 >= GlyphSlot->bitmap.rows) ? 0
00126                                                 : GlyphSlot->bitmap.buffer[i + GlyphSlot->bitmap.width
00127                                                                 * j];
00128                         }
00129                 }
00130 
00131                 newFontMap.CharList[c].charTexture
00132                                 = GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->newTexture();
00133 
00134                 newFontMap.CharList[c].charTexture->loadTextureData(
00135                                 input_data_byte_luminance_alpha, newFontMap.CharList[c].Width,
00136                                 newFontMap.CharList[c].Height, false, Data);
00137 
00138                 delete[] Data;
00139         }
00140 
00141         FontMaps.push_back(newFontMap);
00142 
00143         printf("Pushed back fontmap\n");
00144 }

00147 void FREngine::Render(int PointSize, unsigned int X, unsigned int Y,
00148                 std::string Text) {
00149         printf("Render called\n");
00150 
00151         int Index = -1;
00152 
00153         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < FontMaps.size(); i++) {
00154 
00155                 if (FontMaps[i].PointSize == PointSize) {
00156 
00157                         Index = i;
00158                         break;
00159 
00160                 }
00161 
00162         }
00163 
00164         //Cast to a integer here to that a compiler error isn't thrown due to the precision loss between unsigned and signed
00165         if (Index < 0 || Index >= static_cast<int> (FontMaps.size())) {
00166                 LoadFontmap(PointSize);
00167                 Index = FontMaps.size() - 1;
00168 
00169                 if (Index <= 0) {
00170                         return;
00171                 }
00172         }
00173 
00174         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < Text.size(); i++) {
00175 
00176                 FontMaps[Index].Render(Text[i], X, Y);
00177                 FontChar* tempChar = FontMaps[Index].GetChar(Text[i]);
00178 
00179                 if (tempChar) {
00180 
00181                         X += tempChar->AdvanceX;
00182 
00183                 }
00184 
00185         }
00186 }

00188 void FREngine::Render(int PointSize, unsigned int X, unsigned int Y,
00189                 unsigned int width, unsigned int height, std::string Text) {
00190 
00191         int Index = -1;
00192 
00193         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < FontMaps.size(); i++) {
00194                 if (FontMaps[i].PointSize == PointSize) {
00195                         Index = i;
00196                         break;
00197                 }
00198         }
00199 
00200         //Cast to avoid precision loss warning
00201         if (Index < 0 || Index >= static_cast<int> (FontMaps.size())) {
00202                 LoadFontmap(PointSize);
00203                 Index = FontMaps.size() - 1;
00204 
00205                 if (Index <= 0) {
00206                         return;
00207                 }
00208         }
00209 
00210         int normalWidth = 0;
00211         int normalHeightMax = 0;
00212 
00213         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < Text.size(); i++) {
00214 
00215                 FontChar* tempChar = FontMaps[Index].GetChar(Text[i]);
00216                 normalWidth += tempChar->AdvanceX;
00217 
00218                 if (normalHeightMax < tempChar->CharHeight) {
00219 
00220                         normalHeightMax = tempChar->CharHeight;
00221 
00222                 }
00223 
00224         }
00225 
00226         float XScaler = ((float) width) / ((float) normalWidth);
00227         float YScaler = ((float) height) / ((float) normalHeightMax);
00228 
00229         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < Text.size(); i++) {
00230 
00231                 FontChar* tempChar = FontMaps[Index].GetChar(Text[i]);
00232 
00233                 //FontMaps[Index].Render(Text[i], X, Y, tempChar->OffsetX * XScaler, tempChar->OffsetY, tempChar->Width * XScaler, tempChar->Height);
00234                 FontMaps[Index].Render(Text[i], X, Y, tempChar->OffsetX * XScaler,
00235                                 -tempChar->OffsetY * YScaler, tempChar->Width * XScaler,
00236                                 tempChar->Height * YScaler);
00237 
00238                 if (tempChar) {
00239 
00240                         X += (tempChar->AdvanceX * XScaler);
00241 
00242                 }
00243 
00244         }
00245 
00246 }

00248 void FREngine::Cleanup() {
00249 
00250         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeLine(TAG,
00251                         "Freeing up FreeType resources\n");
00252 
00253         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < FontMaps.size(); i++) {
00254                 FontMaps[i].Cleanup();
00255         }
00256 
00257         FontMaps.clear();
00258 
00259         FT_Done_FreeType(Library);
00260 }
00261 
00262 void FREngine::SetFontPointSize(int Point) {
00263         FT_Set_Char_Size(FontFace, 0, Point * 64, 72, 72);
00264 }
00265 
00266 void FREngine::SetFontPixelSize(int Pixels) {
00267         FT_Set_Pixel_Sizes(FontFace, 0, Pixels);
00268 }

00270 int FREngine::NextPowerTwo(int X) {
00271         int rval = 1;
00272 
00273         while (rval < X)
00274                 rval <<= 1;
00275 
00276         return rval;
00277 }
